databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU_ID , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.NYUKYO_KAMOKU_NAME , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.SEND_FLAG , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.VESSEL_ID , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.DATA_NO , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.USER_KEY , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.RENEW_DATE , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.TS , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.SHOW_ORDER FROM MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU
ORDER BY MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.SHOW_ORDER

SELECT MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU_ID , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.NYUKYO_KAMOKU_NAME , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.SEND_FLAG , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.VESSEL_ID , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.DATA_NO , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.USER_KEY , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.RENEW_DATE , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.TS , MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.SHOW_ORDER FROM MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU
WHERE MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU.MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU_ID = :MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU_ID

INSERT INTO MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU ( MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU_ID , NYUKYO_KAMOKU_NAME , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS , SHOW_ORDER ) VALUES ( :MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU_ID , :NYUKYO_KAMOKU_NAME , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS , :SHOW_ORDER )

UPDATE MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU SET NYUKYO_KAMOKU_NAME = :NYUKYO_KAMOKU_NAME , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS , SHOW_ORDER = :SHOW_ORDER
WHERE MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU_ID = :MS_NYUKYO_KAMOKU_ID
